examples: He's still recovering from his operation.
Todavía se está recuperando de su operación.
She spent many weeks in hospital recovering from her injuries.
Pasó muchas semanas en el hospital recuperándose de sus heridas.
He has fully recovered from the shoulder surgery.
Se ha recuperado por completo de la cirugía de hombro.
She remains in serious condition, but is expected to recover.
Permanece en estado grave, pero se espera que se recupere.
